snippet.title: Praetorians game trailer
snippet.description:
Praetorians is set amidst the political machinations of an emerging Roman Empire. You will be transported back to the dusty battlefields of Egypt, the combat theaters of Gaul and finally to the heart of the Empire itself, Italy in the crusade to become Emperor. Your quest will not be easy, as the Empire is heavily defended by thousands of different troop types and war machines, all with special skills and individual strengths.

+ info: http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Praetorians_(video_game)

Buy PRAETORIANS game for $5.99 on gog:
http://www.gog.com/en/gamecard/praetorians

Now also on Steam :
http://store.steampowered.com/app/277460/?l=english
